[L]Catalog Information[/L]
[L]Catalog URL[/L]     [calc]$url=$Scratch->{ui_catalog_url};$url=~s%/index[^/]*%%;return qq{$url}[/calc]
[L]Secure URL[/L]     [calc]return qq{$Config->{SecureURL}}[/calc]
[L]Location of Error Logs[/L]     [L]Global[/L]: [version extended=1 global_error=1]
[L]Local[/L]: [version extended=1 local_error=1]
[L]Active sessions[/L] [if cgi list_sessions]
([L]last[/L] [calc] int ( $::Variable->{ACTIVE_SESSION_MINUTES} || ( ($Config->{SessionExpire} || 60) / 60) ) [/calc] [L]minutes[/L]) [/if] 		    [if cgi list_sessions][loop list="[dump-session find=1]"][loop-code]
[/loop] [else] [page href="@@MV_PAGE@@" form="list_sessions=1"][L]Show active sessions[/L]
([L]last[/L] [calc] int ( $::Variable->{ACTIVE_SESSION_MINUTES} || ( ($Config->{SessionExpire} || 60) / 60) ) [/calc] [L]minutes[/L]) [/else] [/if] [if cgi show_session]

[L]Showing session[/L]: [cgi show_session]

[dump-session name="[cgi show_session]"] [/if]
[L]Last order number[/L]     [calc] my $cfn = $Variable->{MV_ORDER_COUNTER_FILE} || 'etc/order.number'; $Values->{new_order_number} = $Tag->file($cfn); $Values->{new_order_number} =~ s/.*\n([A-Za-z0-9]+).*$/$1/s; return; [/calc] [page __UI_BASE__/misc_order_number][value new_order_number]

[L]Interchange version[/L]     [version]
[L]Server hostname[/L]     [version extended=1 hostname=1]
[L]Interchange PID[/L]     [version extended=1 pid=1]
[L]Interchange SUID User[/L]     [version extended=1 uid=1]
[L]Server mode[/L]     [version extended=1 mode=1]
[L]Last time server restarted[/L]     [calc] scalar localtime([file-info conf=1 name="interchange.pid" time=1])[/calc]
[L]Last time changes applied[/L]     [file name=`"etc/status.$Config->{CatalogName}"`] ([page __UI_BASE__/reconfig @@MV_PAGE@@][L]apply now[/L])
